summary: Appointment booking app with a known connection issue showing 'Connection issue. Your data has been saved locally. Please click Retry to try again' error unexpectedly.
known_issues: Appointment booking: 'Connection issue. Your data has been saved locally. Please click Retry to try again' message appearing unexpectedly during appointment booking flow.

Please click "Retry" to try again' message does not appear unexpectedly.
